footerContent: WaveWorking! invites you to experience a different kind of auditory communication.

home.title: your thoughtful music consultant
home.content: let music wave in our working!

worry.title: In a shared workspace filled with music.
worry.caption: Have you ever experienced any of the following situations?
worry.0: Hearing a song you like, but having no way of knowing its title.
worry.1: The music doesn't match your taste, and you want to hear your favorite songs.
worry.2: Being too busy, work and personal life become indistinguishable.

expect.title: Let Wave Working! create the coziest office environment for you.
expect.caption: We add a musical touch to your workspace, boosting productivity, and fostering camaraderie among colleagues through the magic of music in the air!

0.heading:
Everyone can easily “
tune in.
”
0.caption: Request your favorite music at any time to satisfy your auditory cravings.

1.heading: Online shared channels.
1.caption: Easily view scheduled playlists and song information.

2.heading: Song request service.
2.caption: Apply to play your desired song in advance, and our online DJ will prioritize it.

3.heading: Real-time music reminders.
3.caption: Set specific times and songs for personalized reminders, such as end-of-day or lunchtime events.
